bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition with pain in the stomach as a major sign. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 55: 治心氣痛，悶亂，山杏 煎方 , “To cure central qi pain , heart-pressure with [stomach] disorder, [use] the recipe with boiled shan xing ”. When the Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 speaks of 心氣痛 , this is mostly a reference to pain in the stomach duct. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 also has xin qi ci tong 心氣刺痛 , central qi piercing pain; xin qi teng tong 心氣疼痛 , central qi pain; xin qi leng tong 心氣冷痛 , central qi cold pain.
